subtitle: greetings I am Meera from The pleadian
High Council today I address you with
insights and guidance amidst the
swirling fear energies enveloping your
planet as we observe from our vantage
point we see the multitude of events
that contribute to this Collective state
of fear environmental upheavals societal
unrest and and a pervasive sense of
uncertainty about the
Future these events test the resilience
of your spirit and the strength of your
[Music]
light particularly for you the star
seeds the sensitivity to these
Collective emotions is
profound your lower chakras the centers
of grounding creativity and personal
power are especially
affected they absorb these fear energies
which can lead to a feeling of
disconnection from your Earthly Mission
and a dimming of Your Inner Light it's a
challenging cycle as the more the
collective fear grows the more your
energetic field can become clouded
impacting your ability to stand as
beacons of light and
transformation to navigate these times
we offer a specific technique designed
to cleanse your energy field realign
your chakras and reinfor force your
connection to the earth and the
cosmos this breath work and grounding
exercise infused with toning is a
powerful tool to transmute fear into
love and
Clarity Begin by finding a quiet space
where you can sit or stand comfortably
close your eyes and take three deep
cleansing
breaths with each inhale Envision pure
crystalline light descending from the C
Cosmos entering through your crown
chakra and filling your entire
being with each exhale imagine releasing
all fear anxiety and lower vibrations
grounding them into the Earth where they
can be
[Music]
transformed now focus on your root
chakra at the base of your spine
visualize a vibrant red light growing
stronger with each breath anchoring you
deeply to the Earth
feel this connection stabilize and
nourish you providing a solid foundation
of security and
Trust next incorporate toning to enhance
the cleansing
process on the exhale use a long
sustained tone of the sound M or ah
whichever resonates with you this sound
vibration will help to break up and
release any stagnant energies within
your lower chakras
facilitating a deeper purification and
realignment continue this toning for
several minutes allowing the sound to
naturally evolve and shift as your
energy clears and
[Music]
brightens finally place your hands on
your heart feeling the warmth and Light
Within affirm to yourself I am grounded
I am clear I am a vessel of light and
love Envision this affirmation radiating
out from your heart enveloping the
planet and all its inhabitants in
healing
[Music]
energy Remember You are not alone in
this journey the collective fear on
Earth is a call to action for all light
workers and star
seeds it is a reminder of the importance
of your mission and the power of your
light to affect
change in these times of fear Your Role
is more critical than ever embrace it
with courage with love and with the
unshakable belief in the Ascension of
Consciousness that is
unfolding let this healing exercise be a
balm for you in the days ahead fear not
for you are supported by the entire
Cosmos in your sacred work together we
will navigate these challenging times
transforming fear into a collective
Awakening and a new dawn for your
planet with deepest love and admiration
